_meta.description: Blood Sorcery content from Rites of the Blood
_meta.note: New paths, rituals, and blood magic traditions for Camarilla, Sabbat, Anarchs, and Independents

Path of the Levinbolt.name: Path of the Levinbolt
Path of the Levinbolt.description: Harness and control electricity. Practitioners cause static electricity around them, interfere with electronics and cellular service.

1.name: Flicker
1.description: Absorb power from electrical outlets, circuits, or batteries. Shut down electrical devices.
1.system: Glance at powered device. On success, shut down device for 10 minutes per success. Spark arcs visibly from device to caster.

2.name: Spark
2.description: Build up static charge and release on touch. Ruins electronics, stuns victims.
2.system: Touch target to release spark. Inflicts 4 dice lethal damage (difficulty 7 to soak). Short-circuits ungrounded electronics.

3.name: Illuminate
3.description: Cover hand or arm in arcing electricity. Can charge batteries, power small devices, or shock targets.
3.system: Successes = turns of power for small devices. Alternatively, shock for 8 dice lethal (difficulty 8 to soak). Can spark around hand/eyes/head for illumination (-2 difficulty to Intimidation).

4.name: Thor's Fury
4.system: Perception + Science (difficulty 6 + range in yards, max 4 yards). Each success = 1 level lethal damage (difficulty 8 to soak).

5.name: Eye of the Storm
5.description: Become a pillar of electrical power with mystical barrier.
5.system: Spend 1 Willpower. Immune to ranged attacks. Metal weapons melt after first strike (wielder takes 1L). Touch deals 2 aggravated (difficulty 8 to soak). Lasts 1 turn + 1 per additional success. Non-metal weapons unaffected.

Path of Spirit Manipulation.name: Path of Spirit Manipulation
Path of Spirit Manipulation.description: Force spirits into actions contrary to their nature. Spirits are constructs from spirit realms (Umbrood) - not wraiths. These may be nature spirits, conceptual spirits, or object spirits.
Path of Spirit Manipulation.note: Spirits are not sentient as traditionally understood - they are reflections of perceived aspects of the universe.

1.name: Hermetic Sight
1.description: Perceive the spirit world overlaid on material world.
1.system: See spirit realm for 1 hour. Each additional success = +30 minutes.

2.name: Astral Cant
2.system: Communicate with any visible spirit for 15 minutes. Each additional success = +15 minutes. Note: spirits may feign ignorance of human tongues. Spirits are not affected by Dominate but may be manipulated by Presence.

3.name: Summon the Spirit
3.description: Call a specific spirit to your location.
3.system: Extended ritual. Must know spirit's True Name or have sympathetic connection. Spirit must obey summons but is not bound to serve.

4.name: Bind the Spirit
4.system: Contested Willpower roll vs spirit. Success binds spirit to one task. Spirit will attempt to twist instructions.

5.name: Imprison the Spirit
5.description: Trap spirit in physical object or location.
5.system: Requires prepared vessel. Contested Willpower roll (difficulty 8 for both). Success imprisons spirit indefinitely. Spirit can be released or forced to power enchantments.

Mastery of the Mortal Shell.name: Mastery of the Mortal Shell
Mastery of the Mortal Shell.description: Control and manipulate the physical body - both living and undead.

1.name: Vertigo
1.description: Cause dizziness and disorientation in target.
1.system: Touch target. Contested roll vs Stamina. Success causes -2 to all Physical dice pools for scene.

2.name: Contortion
2.system: Touch target. Success causes one limb to spasm uncontrollably. -3 dice to actions requiring that limb for scene.

3.name: Seizure
3.system: Touch target. Contested roll vs Stamina (difficulty 7). Success = target wracked with seizures, cannot take actions for turns equal to successes.

4.name: Body Failure
4.system: Touch target. Choose organ (heart, lungs, etc.). Mortals take lethal damage each turn until treated. Vampires suffer severe penalties.

5.name: Marionette
5.description: Take complete control of target's body.
5.system: Touch target. Contested Willpower roll. Success = control target's body (not mind) for turns equal to successes. Target aware but helpless.

1.name: Mental Focus
1.system: +2 dice to Mental rolls for scene. Immune to mundane distractions.

2.name: Iron Will
2.system: +2 difficulty for mental Disciplines used against you. Lasts scene.

3.name: Analytical Mind
3.system: Speed-read, instantly memorize, and recall perfectly for one hour per success.

4.name: Mental Fortress
4.system: Immune to Auspex, Dominate, and similar mental intrusion for scene. Attacker knows they failed but not why.

5.name: Shared Consciousness
5.system: All participants share thoughts and senses. +3 dice to coordinated actions. If one is mentally attacked, all may defend. Lasts scene.

Way of the Spirit.name: Way of the Spirit
Way of the Spirit.description: Command the spirits that inhabit the land. This path deals with the minor spirits bound to locations and natural features.

1.name: Sense the Spirit
1.description: Perceive spirits in the immediate area.
1.system: Sense all spirits within (successes x 10) yards and their general disposition.

2.name: Awaken the Spirit
2.system: Awaken sleeping spirit in object or location. Spirit is not bound but usually curious about awakener.

3.name: Command the Spirit
3.system: Contested Willpower. Success allows one command per success. Spirits may resist actively harmful commands.

4.name: Call the Spirit
4.system: Call known spirit from anywhere in same geographic region. Spirit must answer but is not compelled to obey.

5.name: Master the Spirit
5.description: Bind spirit permanently to location or object.
5.system: Extended ritual. Spirit bound to serve koldun and location/object. May be released as free action.

Way of Sorrows.name: Way of Sorrows
Way of Sorrows.description: Manipulate grief, sorrow, and emotional pain. Tied to the tragic history of the Tzimisce lands.

1.name: Touch of Grief
1.description: Evoke feelings of sadness in target.
1.system: Touch target. They feel profound melancholy for scene. -1 die to all Social rolls except Intimidation.

2.name: Weight of Memory
2.description: Force target to relive painful memory.
2.system: Target relives worst memory. Stunned for 1 turn per success while lost in past.

3.name: Tears of Blood
3.system: Target weeps blood tears. 1 lethal damage per success (mortals) or loses 1 blood per success (vampires).

4.name: Aura of Desolation
4.system: All within (Willpower x 3) yards must roll Courage (difficulty 7) or flee/cower. Lasts scene.

5.name: Curse of Ages
5.system: Extended ritual targeting individual. Victim permanently suffers -1 to all Willpower rolls. Can only be lifted by caster or caster's death.

The Hunter's Winds.name: The Hunter's Winds
The Hunter's Winds.description: Track and hunt prey through mystical connection to the desert winds.

1.name: Scent of the Prey
1.system: With drop of target's blood, track them unerringly for (successes) hours. Works across any terrain.

2.name: Wind's Whisper
2.system: Speak message aloud. Carried to known target within (successes) miles. Target hears as whisper.

3.name: Desert's Fury
3.system: Create blinding sandstorm in (successes x 5) yard radius. All in area -3 dice to Perception and physical actions.

4.name: Wind Walk
4.system: Become intangible wind form for (successes) turns. Cannot be harmed by physical attacks. Can move at great speed.

5.name: Call the Simoom
5.system: Create scorching wind dealing (successes) lethal damage to all in area each turn. Affects area (Willpower x 10) yards. Lasts (successes) turns.

Path of the Evil Eye.name: Path of the Evil Eye
Path of the Evil Eye.description: Curse enemies with a glance. Ancient Middle Eastern tradition of harmful magic through sight.

1.name: Minor Bane
1.system: Glare at target. They suffer minor bad luck for scene - dropped items, stubbed toes, etc. -1 die to one roll per scene (caster's choice when).

2.name: Envious Eye
2.system: Choose something target values. It malfunctions or is damaged within the hour. Severity based on successes.

3.name: Withering Gaze
3.system: Target becomes ill. Mortals: flu-like symptoms, -2 to all pools for (successes) days. Vampires: -1 to all pools for scene.

4.name: Eye of Ruin
4.system: Target suffers major misfortune within 24 hours - car crash, mugging, fire, etc. Severity based on successes. Caster has no control over specifics.

5.name: Death's Gaze
5.system: Lock eyes with mortal target. Contested Willpower roll. If caster wins by 3+, target dies of apparent natural causes within the hour.

The Fires of the Inferno.name: The Fires of the Inferno
The Fires of the Inferno.description: Conjure balefire from Hell. Green flames that taste of eternal damnation. Requires demonic pact.
The Fires of the Inferno.note: Witnessing this power allows anyone with mystical senses to identify the infernal source. Fire under caster's control does not harm them or cause frenzy, but secondary fires affect them normally.

1.name: Lighter
1.system: 1 health level/turn. Difficulty 3 to soak. Only Fortitude can soak.

Path of Phobos.name: Path of Phobos
Path of Phobos.description: Weaponize victims' deepest fears. Requires demonic pact. Using more than once per story causes nightmares.
Path of Phobos.side_effect: Using path more than once per story requires Manipulation + Empathy (difficulty 7). Failures cause blood-soaked nightmares, costing extra blood to wake for 1-7 days based on roll.

1.name: Induce Fear
1.description: Create paranoia - shapes at edge of vision.
1.system: Target in line of sight. -1 to all dice pools. Courage roll (difficulty 4 + successes, max 9) to act normally. Duration: 1 turn to 2 nights based on successes.

2.name: Spook
2.system: Whisper prayer to Hell. Mortals: Courage (difficulty 7) or flee in terror. Vampires: Same, failure = Rötschreck.

3.name: Terrorize
3.description: Manifest target's worst fear as illusion.
3.system: Target sees worst fear (spiders, fire, etc.) - real to them, invisible to others. Courage (difficulty 7) or cower helplessly. Botch = derangement.

4.name: Fear Plague
4.description: Curse with constant fear for one week.
4.system: Loudly curse target. For one week, constantly harassed by their fear. All Willpower rolls at -3 to permanent rating (minimum 1).

5.name: Leech of Fear
5.system: Target must be currently afraid (not from this path). Successes = 'fear pool' points usable as blood, even beyond Generation limits. Must use before sunrise. Botch = no pool, can't use on that victim for 24 hours.

The Taking of the Spirit.name: The Taking of the Spirit
The Taking of the Spirit.description: Strip away Willpower, creating near-soulless servants. Requires demonic pact.
The Taking of the Spirit.system: Loudly invoke Hell, touch target (may need Dex + Brawl). Contested Willpower rolls (difficulty 8). Success removes Willpower equal to successes from victim. Victim reduced to zero becomes zombie-like automaton.
notes: If victim accumulates more successes first, they resist and are immune for one full year
If infernalist is killed, victim regains all Willpower immediately
Botch: Infernalist loses Willpower equal to path rating; if reduced to zero, may be controlled by otherworldly forces

_meta.description: Four distinct approaches to blood magic practiced by Anarchs

Old Skool.name: Old Skool Sorcery
Old Skool.description: Traditional blood magic learned from elders, hedge wizards, or stolen Tremere texts. Formal ritual structure.
Old Skool.botch_effect: Acquires psychosomatic aversion to holy symbols (like Repelled by Crosses flaw). Difficulty to resist Rötschreck = 4 + sorcery rating.
Old Skool.practitioners: Elder Anarchs, those with Tremere contacts, traditionalists

New Age.name: New Age Blood Magic
New Age.description: Spiritual/holistic approach blending blood magic with New Age practices - crystals, chakras, meditation.
New Age.botch_effect: Same as Old Skool - holy symbol aversion.
New Age.practitioners: Spiritual seekers, cult leaders, alternative lifestyle vampires

Punk Sorcery.name: Punk Sorcery
Punk Sorcery.description: Chaotic, anti-authority magic. Uses urban legends, graffiti sigils, defaced religious symbols.
Punk Sorcery.botch_effect: Hysteria derangement - quicker to anger, delights in anarchic destruction of authority symbols.
Punk Sorcery.practitioners: Young rebels, gang members, anti-establishment types

Hacktivist Thaumaturgy.name: Hacktivist Thaumaturgy
Hacktivist Thaumaturgy.description: Technology-integrated magic. Rituals encoded in programs, cast through Internet, use CCTV as focus.

_meta.description: Foundational principles underlying all blood magic

Principle of Blood.name: The Principle of Blood
Principle of Blood.description: Blood fuels all blood magic. The mystical properties of vitae power the transformation of will into reality.

Principle of Will.name: The Principle of Will
Principle of Will.description: The magician's force of will shapes the magic. Willpower is the focusing lens for blood's power.

Principle of Knowledge.name: The Principle of Knowledge
Principle of Knowledge.description: Understanding limits and enables power. Primary path informs all others - no secondary can exceed primary until primary is mastered.

Principle of Identity.name: The Principle of Identity
Principle of Identity.description: Level of connection determines targeting. Line of sight for paths, sympathetic connection for rituals.

Principle of Contagion.name: The Principle of Contagion
Principle of Contagion.description: Things once connected retain links. Stronger past connection = stronger magical link.

difficulty_modifiers.0: Hair, nail, other bodily fluid, magical item created by target
difficulty_modifiers.+2: Object owned and handled within 1 week, fingerprint, relative's blood
difficulty_modifiers.+3: Object handled once in last week

Principle of Sympathy.name: The Principle of Sympathy (Similarity)
Principle of Sympathy.description: Like produces like. Similar things can be magically linked. Used to create effigies and sympathetic focus.

Demonology.name: Demonology
Demonology.description: Knowledge of demons, infernal hierarchies, True Names, summoning, and binding.
Demonology.note: Catholic Church and Sabbat Inquisition restrict circulation. Demons actively spread partial knowledge to encourage contact.
